name: CRYLINE
description:
CRYLINE - top down logic arcade, with unusual gamepaly
In this game you control metal cubes, whose task is to destroy colored crystals
To pass the level, you have to bypass various traps (Mines,Turrets,Thorns,Saw,Bombs)

Features:
- An unusual gameplay
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Nice phyisics
- Lots of interesting levels (60)
- Low system requirements
- Low Price
